item.title: 7 killed as devastating storm pounds central US with more rain, tornado threats
item.description: ​​A four-day, once-in-a-generation weather event is pounding the middle of the U.S. with destructive tornadoes and life-threatening flooding.

item.title: US stocks slide, Trump says tariff policy will 'never change'
item.description: Stock markets continued their slide on Friday morning amid the shockwaves of President Donald Trump's "Liberation Day" tariffs.

item.title: WATCH: Dozens of tornadoes touch down during severe weather event
item.description: The same states in the Midwest and South that were slammed by deadly tornadoes braced for round two as a once-in-a-generation weather event strikes ag...

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: WATCH: Diver has close encounter with huge sunfish
item.description: A diver on an expedition off the coast of Cabo San Lucas, Mexico, captured stunning footage showing the moment another swam alongside a sunfish.
